source.query: SELECT c.client_folder, d.document_date, d.title, d.content, d.idem_key, d.document_id, d.client_id, d.doc_type FROM clinical_documents d JOIN clients c ON d.client_id = c.client_id WHERE d.content IS NOT NULL AND d.doc_type = 'progress-report' ORDER BY c.client_folder, d.document_date
